title.narrative: Uttarakhand Urban Sector Development Investment Program - Tranche 2

description.narrative: Project 2 will develop improve water supply infrastructures to cater for the demand up to 2026 at the government service standards in Almora, Dehradun, Haldwani, Nainital, Pithoragarh, Ramnagar, and Rookee, and sewerage infrastructures to cater for needs up to 2026 in Ramnagar and Rookee. The works in Dehradun and Nainital is continuation of project 1.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

description.narrative: UDD and UUDSA provide improved urban services in 5 towns.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
100% of STP effluent samples meet the government quality standards by 2015. (no STP in 2010)

description.narrative: UDD and UUDSA provide improved urban services in 5 towns.

title.narrative: Sewer charge collection efficiency increased from 38% in 2010 to at least 80% by 2015.

description.narrative: UDD and UUDSA provide improved urban services in 5 towns.

title.narrative: Water charge collection efficiency increased from 50% in 2010 to at least 80% by 2015.

description.narrative: UDD and UUDSA provide improved urban services in 5 towns.

title.narrative: NRW reduced from 40%-60% in 2010 to less than 20% by 2015 in all subproject towns by 2015.

description.narrative: UDD and UUDSA provide improved urban services in 5 towns.
